website_summaries.verdict: Quality made bracelets are perfect party favors for comic book lovers.
pros: Rubber slap bracelets feature popular DC Superhero logos
Non-toxic materials are waterproof and gentle on skin
Fits children, teen, and adult sized wrists
cons: Assorted superheros – may be tough to decide who gets which hero

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how good these are!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality inner material , not flimsy like I honestly expected them to be. Toddlers and kids were able to slap them onto wrists for days (and still going!) without difficulty or any breakage. Very durable. Super comfortable outer coating (almost a soft feeling rubber of sorts?) The kids will tell you it was the coolest thing in our birthday party gift bags this year. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's a great accessory for pinatas and favor bags
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I got this slap bracelets to go along my son's birthday party theme Justice league. He likes the flash but this thunderheart all the different superhero logos so it was great for everyone. It was fast shipping. I order them on Tuesday gotten on Thursday. They are high-quality bracelets . the brightness of the color in the bracelets makes them look appealing and not like a cheap product. The kids loved them boys and girls ❤️.
customer_reviews.author: miroslava

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to add to a favor bag for our son's 10th bday party and they were a hit with the kids. The quality of the item was wonderful and exactly what was described when we received them. They were individually wrapped (this was big plus for me). I would order again with no issues from this seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These things were a hit at my son's birthday party. Much better made than the ones I had when I was little. Will be buying again if he decides on another superhero party next year :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for superhero birthday party! The adults even wanted them lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute for the Superhero Party
customer_reviews.text: We used these are party favors for a 4 yo b'day party. Very cute. And each one arrives in individually wrapped plastic. They were a hit at the superhero party.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these at Easter! They fit in eggs. Assorted and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy L Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love em
customer_reviews.text: Put in goody bags for a 5 yr old Bday party. All the kids loved it. Quality too... Still play with and love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Party hit and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for birthday party favors! Everyone liked them from my daughters 8 year old friends to my 6 month old nephew! They were a hit and GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mspiegel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my sons birthday party... they were a huge hit. 3 months later and kids are still playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Durable product!
customer_reviews.text: The slap bracelets were a huge hit for my son's fifth birthday party. They are good quality and made of a comfortable/durable silicone. As long as they're used properly, this product will definitely last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for birthday party favors very colorful slap right on
customer_reviews.author: Suzzette Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great party favors Felt the texture on the bands waS smooth. Used for toddler party and was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Susan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts and fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoyed getting these bracelets. And it took me back to when I was a kid. Good quality product and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: David Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Missing bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Came missing three bracelets. Really disappointing since they are class gifts and now we are short and have no time to re order.
customer_reviews.author: Katiespur

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE them there good material and don’t hurt your wrist, recently bought from another company was not very happy with them.The design on this are perfect and their comfortable on my wrist. I’m 😍!!!! Totally recommend they shipped the quick...
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH ORTIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: *5-25-19* Bought to put inside some gift bags for my class of 9 students and kept one for me. So far it does appear to be nice quality. Wouldn’t know if they’ll like it but I’m sure that if I enjoy it they will too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Very sturdy. The material is soft rubber, kids loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Party hit
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit at the party. Worth the money and great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor !
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved them ! Both kids and parents were happy with them .
